name: cursor-bridge
description: OpenAI compatible API bridge for Cursor.com using browser automation

scripts.start:auto: AUTO_BROWSER=true HEADLESS=false DEBUG_ENV=true DEBUG_BROWSER=true node src/index.js
scripts.start:headless: AUTO_BROWSER=true HEADLESS=true DEBUG=false DEBUG_ENV=false DEBUG_BROWSER=false node src/index.js
scripts.start:docker: AUTO_BROWSER=true HEADLESS=true DEBUG=true DEBUG_ENV=false DEBUG_BROWSER=false node src/index.js
scripts.test: npm run test:stream && npm run test:non-stream
